about_the_game:
A classic grid & turn-based roguelike, procedurally generated dungeon crawler, aimed at re-creating the games of yesteryear.


Embark on a nostalgic journey with our classic turn-based roguelike dungeon crawler, crafted to evoke the souls of games from the classic eras.

Select your path from various classes: Knight, Necromancer, and Mage. Or, if you crave an unforgiving challenge, take on the Naked Class. Begin as an old man with nothing – minimal HP and scarce magical abilities.

Your adventure begins at the dungeon's top floor, and your quest is to delve deeper through ten progressively challenging levels. Each level introduces heightened difficulty, more diverse enemy types, and increased numbers. Can you endure the trials of this procedurally generated dungeon and conquer all ten terrifying levels? The choice is yours.



Game Music by Hodslate Productions

legal_notice:
Main Development by Paul Miller & Base Development Jonathan Morau
Most in-game art from Itch.io creators, both free and paid for/licensed by Wild Interloper.
